svg.text: I'm not really a stencil. Please delete me

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'container', bound: new Bound(0, 0, $box.w, $box.h), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(1, 1), multi: false})

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'container', bound: new Bound(5, 0, Math.max($box.w, 150) - 20, Math.max($box.h, 50) - 10), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1), multi: false})

Property.name: cornerStyle
Property.p:enumValues: ['none|None', 'all|All rounded', 'top|Rounded top corners', 'bottom|Rounded bottom corners', 'left|Rounded left corners', 'right|Rounded right corners']

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'container', bound: new Bound(10, 10, ($box.w-20), ($box.h - 20)), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1), multi: false})

Attr.Arg:
"font-family: Comic Sans, Comic Sans MS, cursive;" + "font-size: " + $textFont.size + ";" + "font-style: " + $textFont.style + ";" + "font-weight: " + $textFont.weight + ";" + "text-decoration: " + $textFont.decor + ";" + "color: #5e5314;" +
"position:relative;" + "top: 10px;" + "left: 10px;" + "white-space: pre-line;" + "width: " + ($box.w-20) + "px;" + "height: " + ($box.h-100) + "px;" + "line-height: 120%;" + "padding:0px 0px;" + "vertical-align:top;" + $customStyle2.value

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'container', bound: new Bound(5, 0, Math.max($box.w, 150) - 20, Math.max($box.h, 36) - 10), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1), multi: false})

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'container', bound: new Bound(5, 0, Math.max($box.w, 150) - 20, Math.max($box.h, 36) - 10), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1), multi: false})

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'container', bound: new Bound(5, ($box.h/2)-15, $box.w-10, 30), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(1, 1), multi: false})

Attr.Arg:
"font-family: " + $textFont.family + ";" + "font-size: " + $textFont.size + ";" + "font-style: " + $textFont.style + ";" + "font-weight: " + $textFont.weight + ";" + "text-decoration: " + $textFont.decor + ";" + "color: " + $textColor.toRGBString() + ";" +
"display: inline-block;" + "width: " + ($box.w) + "px;" + "height: " + ($box.h-1) + "px;" + "line-height: " + ($box.h-2-1) + "px;" + "border-bottom: 1px solid #20546f;" + "text-shadow: 0 1px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.16);" + "text-align: center;" + "background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #2d9bd6 0%, #1c90d0 33%, #0986ca 66%, #0081c7 100%);" + "color:#ffffff;" + "box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25), inset 0 -2px 0 #0070ad;" + $customStyle1.value + $customStyle2.value

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'container', bound: new Bound(37, 0, 70,36), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(1, 1), multi: false})

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'container', bound: new Bound(0, 0, Math.min($box.w, 150), Math.min($box.h, 40)), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(1, 1), multi: false})

Action.Impl: var b = this.getBounding(); return [ new SnappingData("ContentLeft", b.x + b.width - 2, "Left", true, this.id), new SnappingData("ContentTop", b.y + b.height - 2, "Top", true, this.id), new SnappingData("ContentBottom", b.y - 2, "Bottom", true, this.id), new SnappingData("ContentRight", b.x - 2, "Right", true, this.id), ]

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'container', bound: new Bound(5, ($box.h/2)-15, $box.w-10, 30), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(1, 1), multi: false})

Attr.Arg:
"font-family: " + $textFont.family + ";" + "font-size: " + $textFont.size + ";" + "font-style: " + $textFont.style + ";" + "font-weight: " + $textFont.weight + ";" + "text-decoration: " + $textFont.decor + ";" + "color: " + $textColor.toRGBString() + ";" +
"display: inline-block;" + "width: " + ($box.w-2) + "px;" + "height: " + ($box.h-2) + "px;" + "line-height: " + ($box.h-4) + "px;" + "border-width: 1px;" + "border-style: solid;" + "border-radius: 5px;" +
"text-shadow: 0 -1px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.16);" + "text-align: center;" + "background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #eeeff1, #dadce1);" + "border-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.15) rgba(0,0,0,0.15) rgba(0,0,0,0.25);" + "color:#666666;" + "text-shadow: 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255, 0.25);" + "box-shadow: inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.45);" + ($state.value == "clicked" ? "background-image:none; background-color: #D4D7DC; box-shadow: inset 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);" : "") + ($state.value == "hover" ? "background-image:none; background-color: #D4D7DC;" : "") + ($disabled.value ? "background-image: none; background-color: #D4D7DC; opacity: 0.65; box-shadow: none;" : "") + $customStyle1.value + $customStyle2.value

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'container', bound: new Bound(5, ($box.h/2)-15, $box.w-10, 30), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(1, 1), multi: false})

Attr.Arg:
"font-family: " + $textFont.family + ";" + "font-size: " + $textFont.size + ";" + "font-style: " + $textFont.style + ";" + "font-weight: " + $textFont.weight + ";" + "text-decoration: " + $textFont.decor + ";" + "color: " + $textColor.toRGBString() + ";" +
"display: inline-block;" + "border-width: 1px;" + "border-style: solid;" + "border-radius: 5px;" +
"height: " + ($box.h-2) + "px;" + "width: " + ($box.w-2) + "px;" + "line-height: " + ($box.h-4) + "px;" +
"text-shadow: 0 -1px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.16);" + "text-align: center;" + "background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #00a5ff, #0084cc);" + "border-color:#0f6597;" + "color:#ffffff;" + "text-shadow: 0 -1px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.16);" + "box-shadow: inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25);" + ($state.value == "clicked" ? "background-image: none; background-color: #007DC2; box-shadow: inset 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);" : "") + ($state.value == "hover" ? "background-image: none; background-color: #007DC2;" : "") + ($disabled.value ? "background-image: none; background-color: #007DC2; box-shadow: none; opacity: 0.65;" : "") + $customStyleHidden.value + $customStyle1.value + $customStyle2.value

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'container', bound: new Bound(5, ($box.h/2)-15, $box.w-10, 30), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(1, 1), multi: false})

Attr.Arg:
"font-family: " + $textFont.family + ";" + "font-size: " + $textFont.size + ";" + "font-style: " + $textFont.style + ";" + "font-weight: " + $textFont.weight + ";" + "text-decoration: " + $textFont.decor + ";" + "color: " + $textColor.toRGBString() + ";" +
"display: inline-block;" + "width: " + ($box.w-2) + "px;" + "height: " + ($box.h-2) + "px;" + "line-height: " + ($box.h-4) + "px;" + "border-width: 1px;" + "border-style: solid;" + "border-radius: 5px;" +
"text-shadow: 0 -1px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.16);" + "text-align: center;" + "background-color: #E68C24;" + "background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #E7B433, #E79C2C 50%, #E59123 51%, #E97926);" + "border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);" + "color:#ffffff;" + "text-shadow: 0 -1px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.16);" + "box-shadow: inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25);" + ($state.value == "clicked" ? "background-image: none; background-color: #E8731D; box-shadow: inset 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);" : "") + ($state.value == "hover" ? "background-image: none; background-color: #E8731D;" : "") + ($disabled.value ? "background-image: none; background-color: #E8731D; box-shadow: none; opacity: 0.65;" : "") + $customStyle1.value + $customStyle2.value

For.Box: var size = F.elementSize("textDiv"); new Dimension(size.w, size.h); /* depends $textFont $textContent $customStyle */

foreignObject.div: Rich text pane contains hyper text

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'container', bound: new Bound(5, 0, Math.max($box.w, 150) - 20, 30), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1), multi: false})

Attr.Arg:
"font-family: " + $textFont.family + ";" + "font-size: " + $textFont.size + ";" + "font-style: " + $textFont.style + ";" + "font-weight: " + $textFont.weight + ";" + "text-decoration: " + $textFont.decor + ";" + "color: " + $textColor.toRGBString() + ";" +
"display: inline-block;" + "width: " + ($box.w-12) + "px;" + "height: 28px;" + "line-height: 28px;" + "border-width: 1px;" + "border-style: solid;" + "border-radius: 5px;" + ($state.value == "alerted" ? "border-color: #b94a48;" : "border-color: #b5b5b5;") + ($state.value == "disabled" ? "background-color: #f6f4f1; border-color: #c7c0b4; color: #999999;" : "background-color: #ffffff;") + ($state.value == "disabled" ? " " : "box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px #dedede;") + ($state.value == "alerted" ? "box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px #dedede, 0 0px 2px rgba(175,74,72,.75);" : "") + ($state.value == "alerted" ? "position:relative; top:3px; left:3px;" : "") + "padding:0px 5px;" + $customStyle1.value + $customStyle2.value + $customStyle3.value

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'container', bound: new Bound(5, 0, Math.max($box.w, 150) - 20, Math.max($box.h, 50) - 10), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1), multi: true})

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'container', bound: new Bound(5, 0, Math.max($box.w, 150) - 20, 30), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1), multi: false})

Attr.Arg: "position:absolute;" + "right:8px;" + "top:12px;" + "width:0px;" + "height:0px;" + "border-left:4px solid transparent;" + "border-right:4px solid transparent;" + "border-top:8px solid #595959;" + "display: inline-block;" + $customStyle3.value

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'container', bound: new Bound(5, 0, Math.max($box.w, 150) - 20, Math.max($box.h, 50) - 10), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1), multi: false})

Attr.Arg: "display: inline-block;" + "width: " + ($box.w-2) + "px;" + "height: " + ($box.h-2) + "px;" + "border-width: 1px;" + "border-style: solid;" + "border-radius: 3px;" + "border-color: black;" + "background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.85);" + "box-shadow: inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,0.2);" + $customStyle1.value

"position:absolute;" + ($leftTip.value ? "left:15px;" : "left:46%;") + "bottom:1px;" + "width:0px;" + "height:0px;" + "border-left:6px solid transparent;" + "border-right:6px solid transparent;" + "border-top:6px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.95);" + "display: inline-block;" + $customStyle3.value

Property.name: title
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'container', bound: new Bound(15, 10, Math.max($box.w, 200) - 100, 40), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1), multi: false})

Attr.Arg: "display: block; width:8px; border-width: 1px; border-radius: 5px; border-style: solid;"

Property.name: contentText
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'content', bound: Bound.fromBox($box, 0, 52), font: $itemFont, align: new Alignment(0, 0), multi: true})
